snippet: Niese, making his first start since rejoining the Mets, was not alone in his struggles as Rickie Weeks Jr. and Yasmany Tomas combined for four homers to lead an Arizona rout....
lead_paragraph: Niese, making his first start since rejoining the Mets, was not alone in his struggles as Rickie Weeks Jr. and Yasmany Tomas combined for four homers to lead an Arizona rout.

headline.main: Jon Niese Returns to Starting Role, and Mets Return to Losing
